Start Your Adventure

Bella's Travel Adventures: Geography Lesson 1

Geography is one of my most favorite subjects. I just love traveling to new places and seeing all the different people, sights, and historical markers! I even saw a feather pen at a museum and learned that Presidents used to sign papers with it. So cool! Did you know ink was made up of fruits, flowers and plants?
